https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yv08QNl005TxbnA9viUo2APPqE2.jpg An aging salesman is fired from his job after a long career in it. Broken, without much to look forward to, he tries reconnecting with his wife and kids who he had always put down as he dedicated himself to work. Death of a Salesman
